4HF.F.summary: Hoist Finance AB (publ), a credit market company, engages in the loan acquisition and management operations in Europe. It purchases performing and non-performing loans from its partners, international banks, and financial institutions. The company also provides current account and fixed-term deposits. The company was formerly known as Hoist International AB (publ) and changed its name to Hoist Finance AB (publ) in January 2015. Hoist Finance AB (publ) was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.
